mutants.code:
import collections
import re

def top_three_words(text):
    if text is None and text == '':
        return 'The text is empty or null.'
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text)
    words_counter = collections.Counter(words)
    top_three = words_counter.most_common(3)
    return [word for (word, freq) in top_three]

    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text)

    return [word for (word, freq) in top_three]

import collections
import re

def top_three_words(text):
    if text is None or text == '':
        return ''
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text)
    words_counter = collections.Counter(words)
    top_three = words_counter.most_common(3)
    return [word for (word, freq) in top_three]

def top_three_words(text):
    if text is None or text == '':
        return 'The text is empty or null.'
    text = text.lower()
    words = re.findall('', text)
    words_counter = collections.Counter(words)
    top_three = words_counter.most_common(3)
    return [word for (word, freq) in top_three]

import collections
import re

def top_three_words(text):
    if text is None or text == '':

def top_three_words(text):
